Actor
public final class BattleField
extends TiledLayer
implements Actor

This class defines the battle field for the game.

isOnSnow

public boolean isOnSnow(int x,
                        int y)
check if one snow filed, if on snow, the tank move a bit faster.

Parameters:
x - x coordinate.
y - y coordinate.
Returns:
true on the snow field.

hitWall

public boolean hitWall(int x,
                       int y,
                       int strength)
Check if given point hit wall in the battle field. If hits wall, the wall will be destoryed if with enough strength.

Parameters:
x - x coordinate.
y - y coordinate.
strength - the strength of the the hitting object.
Returns:
true hit the wall.
